put.description: Updates the text of an existing translation

delete.description: Deletes a translation by its identifier

get.description: Returns a single trait localized according to the current request locale

delete.description: Deletes a trait by its ID (ADMIN only)

get.description: Returns a single quiz localized according to the current request locale

delete.description: Deletes a quiz by its ID (ADMIN only)

put.description: Updates question text, type, or order. Only administrators are allowed.

delete.description: Deletes a question by ID. Only administrators are allowed.

put.description: Changes the display order of a question within a quiz version.

get.description: Returns a single profession by its ID with localized fields.

put.description: Updates an existing profession. Only administrators are allowed.

delete.description: Deletes a profession by ID. Only administrators are allowed.

put.description:
Updates the list of traits associated with a specific option.
Traits not present in the request will be removed.
Accessible only to administrators.

post.description:
Assigns a list of traits with weights to a specific option.
Existing trait assignments (if any) will be replaced.
Accessible only to administrators.

put.description:
Updates an existing answer option.
Only administrators can modify options.

delete.description:
Deletes an answer option permanently.
This operation cannot be undone.

put.description:
Updates the display order of an option within a question.
Order must be a non-negative integer.
Updates an existing profession category by ID. Accessible only to administrators.

delete.description: Deletes a profession category by ID. Accessible only to administrators.

get.description: Returns translations for a given entity, entity ID, and locale

post.description: Creates a new translation entry for a specific entity field and locale

message.locale: locale must be a valid language code (e.g., en, en-US)

get.description: Returns all traits localized according to the current request locale

post.description: Creates a new trait (ADMIN only)

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of quizzes localized according to the current request locale.

Pagination is supported via standard Spring Data parameters:
- `page` (default: 1)
- `size` (number of items per page, default: 20)
- `sort` (sorting criteria, e.g. `id,asc` or `title,desc`)

Example:
`/quizzes?page=0&size=10&sort=title,asc`

post.description: Creates a new quiz (ADMIN only)
Publishes a quiz and creates a new current quiz version (ADMIN only)
Creates a new draft version by copying the latest version (ADMIN only)
Creates a new question for a quiz version. Only administrators are allowed.

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of professions with localized fields.

Pagination parameters:
- `page` (0-based index, default: 0)
- `size` (page size, default: 20)
- `sort` (sorting field, default: id)

Example:
`/professions?page=0&size=10&sort=id,asc`

post.description: Creates a new profession. Only administrators are allowed.

Creates a new answer option for a question.
Only administrators are allowed to perform this operation.

Executes the machine-learning scoring engine using a raw set of demo answers.
This endpoint is intended for testing and demonstration purposes only.

Executes the LLM-based scoring engine using a raw set of demo answers.
Returns recommendations and explanations generated by the LLM.

get.description: Returns a list of all profession categories. Accessible only to administrators.

post.description: Creates a new profession category. Accessible only to administrators.
Creates a new user account using email and password.
Resets a user's password using a valid reset token.
Sends a password reset link to the user's email address if it exists.
Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Authenticates a user and returns JWT access and refresh tokens.
Authenticates a user using Google One Tap ID token.

Finalizes an attempt and triggers scoring logic.

- Calculates trait scores
- Calls external ML service
- Produces profession recommendations
Adds a single answer to an active attempt.

400.description: Attempt already submitted or invalid option

post.description: Adds multiple answers to an active attempt in a single request.

Starts a new quiz attempt for a given quiz version.

- If the user is authenticated, the attempt is linked to the user
- If the user is anonymous, a guest token is generated and returned

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of users.

    Pagination parameters:
    - page: page number (0-based)
    - size: page size
    - sort: sorting criteria (e.g. id,asc)
Returns the profile of the currently authenticated user

get.summary: Get all translations for entity type
get.description: Returns all translations for a given entity type across all locales
Returns all versions of a quiz
Returns a specific version of a quiz by version number
Returns the currently published quiz version

Returns all answer options for a specific question.
Option labels are localized according to the request locale.

200.description: List of options for the question

get.summary: Get questions for current quiz version (paginated)
get.description:
Returns questions for the current published version of a quiz.

Pagination parameters:
- `page` (0-based index, default: 0)
- `size` (page size, default: 20)
- `sort` (sorting field, default: ord)

Example:
`/questions/quiz/5?page=0&size=10&sort=ord,asc`

get.summary: Get questions for a specific quiz version (paginated)
get.description:
Returns questions for a specific quiz version.

Pagination parameters:
- `page` (0-based index)
- `size` (page size)
- `sort` (sorting field)

Example:
`/questions/quiz/5/version/2?page=1&size=10`

Returns all attempts for the current user.

- Authenticated users: attempts linked to user account
- Guest users: attempts linked via guest token
Returns final scoring results and recommendations for a submitted attempt.

Administrative search over attempts.

Supports filtering by:
- user
- quiz
- date range

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user's account after password confirmation.

ExceptionDto.description: Standardized API error response returned for all handled exceptions

code.description: HTTP status code representing the error type

time.description: Timestamp indicating when the error occurred (ISO-8601 format)

message.description:
Error details. May be:
- a string message (e.g. 'Invalid credentials')
- a structured object containing validation errors

UpdateTranslationRequest.description: Request payload for updating a localized translation value

CreateTraitRequest.description: Request payload for creating a psychological trait

code.description: Unique trait code (e.g. R, I, A)

bipolarPairCode.description: Code of the opposite trait in a bipolar pair

TraitDto.description: Represents a psychological trait used in assessment scoring

code.description: Short code representing the trait (e.g. RIASEC dimension)

examples: Preference for hands-on activities and practical problem solving

bipolarPairCode.description: Code of the opposing trait in a bipolar pair

UpdateQuizRequest.description: Request payload for updating quiz metadata

categoryId.description: Identifier of the new quiz category

QuizDto.description: Represents a quiz definition and its metadata

code.description: Short unique code used to reference the quiz

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the quiz

processingMode.description: Processing mode used to evaluate quiz results

categoryId.description: Identifier of the category this quiz belongs to

authorId.description: Identifier of the user who authored the quiz

UpdateQuestionRequest.description: Request payload for updating a quiz question

ord.description: New display order of the question

examples: How interested are you in programming?

OptionDto.description: Represents a selectable option for a quiz question

questionId.description: Identifier of the question this option belongs to

ord.description: Order index of the option within the question (1-based)

label.description: Text label shown to the user for this option

QuestionDto.description: Represents a question within a quiz version

quizVersionId.description: Identifier of the quiz version this question belongs to

ord.description: Order of the question within the quiz

qtype.description: Type of question defining how the user should answer

text.description: Text displayed to the user for this question
examples: I enjoy solving practical problems using my hands

options.description: List of selectable answer options for the question

CreateProfessionRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new profession

examples: Designs, builds, and maintains software systems and applications.

mlClassCode.description: ML classification code returned by the ML model

ProfessionDto.description: Represents a profession that can be recommended to users based on quiz results

code.description: Short internal code of the profession

description.description: Detailed description of the profession, shown to end users
examples: Software engineers design, develop, and maintain software systems and applications.

mlClassCode.description: Machine Learning class code used to map ML predictions to this profession

OptionTraitListRequest.description: Request payload for assigning multiple trait weights to a question option

traits.description: List of trait-weight associations for the option

OptionTraitRequest.description: Represents the association between an option and a trait with a weighted contribution

weight.description:
Weight applied to the trait when this option is selected.
Can be positive or negative depending on scoring logic.

UpdateOptionRequest.description: Request payload for updating a quiz option

ord.description: New display order of the option

label.description: Updated label text of the option

CreateCategoryRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new profession category

colorCode.description: Hex color code associated with the category (used in UI)

ProfessionCategoryDto.description: Represents a category used to group professions

id.description: Unique identifier of the profession category

colorCode.description: Hex color code used for UI representation of the category

CreateTranslationRequest.description: Request payload for creating or updating a translation

entityId.description: Identifier of the entity being translated

field.description: Field of the entity to translate

CreateQuizRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new quiz

processingMode.description: Processing mode defining how results are calculated

authorId.description: Identifier of the quiz author (admin user)

QuizVersionDto.description: Represents a specific published version of a quiz

id.description: Unique identifier of the quiz version

quizId.description: Identifier of the quiz this version belongs to

version.description: Sequential version number of the quiz

isCurrent.description: Indicates whether this is the currently active quiz version

publishedAt.description: Timestamp when the quiz version was published

CreateQuestionRequest.description: Request payload for creating a quiz question

quizVersionId.description: Identifier of the quiz version this question belongs to

ord.description: Order of the question within the quiz version

qtype.description: Type of the question (e.g. single_choice, multi_choice, liker_scale_5)

text.description: Question text shown to the user
examples: I enjoy solving complex technical problems.

CreateOptionRequest.description: Request payload for creating a new question option

questionId.description: Identifier of the question this option belongs to

ord.description: Display order of the option within the question

RecommendationDto.description: Career recommendation generated by the scoring engine

explanation.description: Human-readable explanation of why this profession was recommended

ScoringResult.description: Final scoring result produced after evaluating a quiz attempt

traitScores.description:
Calculated trait scores based on quiz answers.
Each entry maps a trait profile to its aggregated score.

recommendations.description: List of profession recommendations generated by the ML scoring engine

email.description: User email address used for authentication

displayName.description: Display name shown in the application UI

password.description:
User password.
Must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one numeric digit.

ResetPasswordDto.description: Request payload for completing a password reset using a reset token

token.description: Password reset token sent to the user's email

newPassword.description:
New password for the user account.
Must contain at least one numeric digit and be at least 6 characters long.

RequestResetPasswordDto.description: Request payload for initiating a password reset process

email.description: Email address associated with the user account

RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request payload used to refresh an expired access token

refreshToken.description: Refresh token previously issued during authentication

LoginResponse.description: Response returned after successful authentication or token refresh

token.description: JWT access token used to authorize API requests

refreshToken.description: Refresh token used to obtain a new access token

expiresIn.description: Access token expiration time in seconds

LoginUserDto.description: Request payload used for authenticating a user

email.description: Email address used for user authentication

rememberMe.description: If true, a long-lived refresh token will be issued

GoogleOneTapLoginRequest.description: Request payload for Google One Tap authentication

token.description: Google ID token obtained from Google One Tap login

AttemptResultDto.description: Detailed result of a completed quiz attempt

traitScores.description:
Calculated trait scores.
The key represents the trait code, the value represents the score.

recommendations.description: List of recommended professions based on ML prediction

traitCode.description: Short code representing the trait (e.g. RIASEC dimension)

score.description: Probability score assigned by the ML model (range 0.0  1.0)

AddAnswerRequest.description: Request payload for submitting a single answer to a quiz attempt

AddAnswersBulkRequest.description: Request payload for submitting multiple answers in a single operation

AttemptStartResponse.description: Response returned when a quiz attempt is started

attemptId.description: Unique identifier of the created attempt

guestToken.description:
Guest access token used to continue the attempt without authentication.
Null for authenticated users.

AttemptSummaryDto.description: Summary information about a quiz attempt

quizVersionId.description: Identifier of the quiz version associated with this attempt

startedAt.description: Timestamp when the attempt was started (ISO-8601)

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the attempt was submitted, null if not completed

isCompleted.description: Indicates whether the attempt has been completed
